name: Minecraft Note Block Studio File
summary: An NBS file contains an audio project created by Minecraft Note Block Studio (NBS) or Open NBS, which are third-party programs used to create custom Minecraft music. It contains note blocks organized to be played as an in-game song. NBS files also contain song metadata , including the song's name, author, and length.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: NBS file open in Open Note Block Studio
images.alt: NBS file open in Open Note Block Studio
